title: U.S. Policy On Syria Marked By Caution, Official Says
teaser: Rick Barton, a top State Department official, says sometimes the U.S. has to take risks in diplomacy. He's behind a program to pay 1,300 police officers in the hotly contested city of Aleppo, Syria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
